unnormalised: Organic farming is the way to go, bhai! My dada ji, Kishan Lal, always said 'back to basics'. Heard about it from Krishi Vigyan Kendra, Pusa. It's like the "Lagaan" movie IRL, you know? Less pesticides, healthier food for everyone in Gurgaon. Maybe even grow some proper desi tomatoes, like they used to get in Bihar! No more Rs. 500 ka chemically-treated produce!
normalised: Organic farming is the way to go, bhai! My dada ji, Kishan Lal, always said 'back to basics'. Heard about it from K R I S H I Vigyan Kendra, Pusa. It's like the "Lagaan" movie I R L, you know? Less pesticides, healthier food for everyone in Gurgaon. Maybe even grow some proper desi tomatoes, like they used to get in Bihar! No more rupee five hundred ka chemically-treated produce!
